costHistory.weightedAvgDesc: Weighted average cost of remaining stock:
costHistory.weightedAvgNote: This value shows the weighted average of unsold stock using the FIFO method.
costHistory.selectProductDesc: Select a product from above to view cost history. You can see FIFO-based cost lots for each purchase.

stockValuation.title: Stock Valuation Report
stockValuation.subtitle: View current stock value, aging analysis, and product-based valuation
stockValuation.agingDesc: Stock value distribution by stock age
stockValuation.infoFifo: FIFO Value: Stock value calculated using First In First Out method. Oldest purchased stock is consumed first.
stockValuation.infoAging: Stock Aging: Calculated based on oldest stock lot date. Used as an indicator for slow-moving inventory.
stockValuation.infoAvgCost: Average Cost: Weighted average unit cost of remaining stock.

profitability.title: Profitability Analysis
profitability.subtitle: Analyze product-based gross profit for the selected period
profitability.noSales: No sales data for this period
profitability.topProfitableDesc: Products with highest profit in the selected period
profitability.leastProfitableDesc: Products with lowest profit margin - review pricing or costs
profitability.infoFifo: FIFO Cost: Stock is consumed in purchase order. Cost calculation includes exact cost of consumed lots.
profitability.infoMargin: Gross Margin: (Revenue - Cost) / Revenue Ã— 100. Products below 20% margin may need pricing review.
profitability.infoCommission: This analysis only includes product costs. Marketplace commission, shipping, and other expenses are not included.

info.title: About Customer Analytics
info.description: Customer data is derived from order information obtained via the Trendyol API. Customer identities are encrypted, and matching is performed through unique email addresses. The Trendyol API provides access to the last 90 days of order data.
